column1: "If we  wrongly  construe  the  law  the  remedy  is  by

appeal 
to  His  Majesty  in  Council.  If on  the  other

hand  we  rightly  construe 
the  law  and  the  law 
is

unpalatable 
to  any  section  of the  community, 
the

remedy  of  that  section  of  the  community 
is 
to

endeavour, 
to  have 
the 
law  amended. 
if possible
